select * from mt_goods t where t.STATUS = 'A'

and t.PRICE > 0 and (t.name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or t.goods_no = #{keyword} or t.ID = #{keyword} or t.description like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')) order by t.sort asc
